sentences: Theodore Curson (June 3, 1935 â€“ November 4, 2012) was an American jazz trumpeter.
He attended Granoff School of Music in Philadelphia.
At the suggestion of Miles Davis, he moved to New York in 1956.
He performed and recorded with Cecil Taylor in the late 1950s and early 1960s.
He was a familiar face in Finland, having performed at the Pori Jazz festival every year since it began in 1966.
In 2007, he performed at Finland's Independence Day Ball at the invitation of president Tarja Halonen.
The Tenor Stylings of Bill Barron (Savoy, 1961)
Bill Dixon & Archie Shepp, Bill Dixon 7-tette/Archie Shepp and the New York Contemporary 5 (Savoy, 1964)
Teo Macero, Impressions of Charles Mingus (Palo Alto, 1983)
